label: 源経信
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1016-1097). Also known as Katsura Dainagon 桂大納言 (the Katsura Major Counsellor"). Father of Michitoki, Mototsuna, and Toshiyori. Grandfather of Shun'e. Well-known biwa player. Private waka collection Dainagon Tsunenobu shū. Nan Goshūi shō ("Faults in the Goshuishū," after 1086; a criticism of the Goshuishū, the first in its kind). Diary Sochi ki (or Tsunenobu kyō ki 経信卿記; covers the years 1065-1088). [道時、基綱、俊頼、俊恵、琵琶、和歌、大納言経信集、難後拾遺抄、後拾遺集、帥記] "
